content: for gauge 3 pattern repeats = 10 inches 25 5 cm combine the fabulous texture of homespun with this fun pattern to make an afghan anybody would snuggle under lionbrand com lion brand pattern # 80208ad corrections applied nov 10 2009 skill level intermediate #790 homespun a 790-311 rococo 5 balls b 790-400 chili discontinued color 3 balls c 790-401 saffron 2 balls d 790-403 earth 2 balls 4 colors 12 balls total special stitches 3-treble_crochet cluster 4-treble_crochet cluster 7-treble_crochet cluster work in pattern color sequence for 94 row crochet edging to finish
